name: Adaptive Plus Inc.
description: Developer of an e-commerce store maker app intended to help businesses launch an online store. The company's platform offers a variety of features, such as a drag-and-drop editor, customizable templates, and integrated payment processing, enabling small businesses to create and manage their own online stores easily.
